conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a suspense movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I'd highly recommend checking out "Memento" if you're looking for a suspenseful ride! This intriguing film tells the story of a man with short-term memory loss searching for his wife's murderer, featuring an impressive cast including Guy Pearce and Carrie-Anne Moss. Alternatively, "Source Code" is another great option - it's about a soldier who finds himself in a time loop, trying to uncover the commuter train bomber within 8 minutes. Enjoy the thrilling suspense!

Another intriguing film is "The Game" with Michael Douglas. It delves into the mysteries and complexities of life as a man embarks on an extraordinary game that will challenge his perceptions. Both are fantastic choices if you enjoyed Memento!
